```{r}
# Datatypes
w  <- 9 # Numeric
x  <- 10.5 # Numeric
y  <- 10L # Integer
z  <- 1i # Complex
```


```{r}
# Type Conversion
# as.integer()
a  <- as.numeric(y)
print(a)

# as.integer()
b  <-  as.integer(w)
class(b)

# as.complex()
c  <- as.complex(w)
c
class(c)
```
